name: Glass Galaxies - a theme for Bungie.net
description: This style is a custom theme for use on Bungie.net. It re-skins the website to give the page elements a shiny, glassy appearance. This is the Alpha version, so it isn't yet complete and may not work as intended. If you find any problems or have any feedback, please post it here: http://www.bungie.net/Forums/posts.aspx?postID=27428424 or send me a private message on Bungie.net (username: Zoidberg25).
additional_info:
Current version: RETIRED (as of January 10th, 2013)
Due to the launch of the updated Bungie.net design (released January 10th 2013), this theme only works for the archived pre-update halo.bungie.net. It will receive no further updates.

Changelog:
January 10th, 2013 [major]
> Script now only functions on halo.bungie.net.
> Script has been retired and will receive no further updates.
September 25th, 2011 [minor]
> Fixed footer bug (large plain box in Chrome).
> Added multiple default background options.
> Added new 'Forge World' background.
September 23rd, 2011 [major]
> Biggest update since release.
> First version of per-forum themes,
> currently supported by game-specific forums only.
September 19th, 2011 [minor]
> Should work correctly with the uStalk greasemonkey script in Firefox.
August 3rd, 2011 [minor]
> Includes a few minor fixes and additions.
> Works with the latest official Bungie.net design.
